mapper.select: select a.id,b.mobile,b.name,c.companyname,a.assureid,a.assuredid,a.money,a.state from assure a,user b,company c where a.assureid=b.id and b.companyid=c.id and b.mobile=#{mobile} and a.state !=3
select a.id,b.mobile,b.name,c.companyname,a.assureid,a.assuredid,a.money,a.state from assure a,user b,company c where a.assuredid=b.id and b.companyid=c.id and a.mobile=#{mobile} and a.state !=3
mapper.update: update assure set state=3 where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO assure( id, assureid, assuredid, money ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{assureid}, #{assuredid}, #{money} )
mapper.select: select * from assure where id = #{id} and state=0
